item.text: Really quit?
Disabled in demo version!
The file %s allready exists.\nShould it be overwritten?

No window selected supporting cut operation!
No window selected supporting paste operation!
No window selected supporting delete operations!
Could not start help!
The file %s could not be found!
Error loading song %s !
Fatal error: Arrange grid could not be created!
DMO lock failed!
DMO flush failed!
DMO unlock failed!
Error saving samplebank %s:\n%s
Do you really want to delete the selected channel?

The instrument %s could not be created!
Error parsing %s:\n%s
The instrument number %s could not be loaded!
An error occured during wave export!
The export session could not be started:\n The output file %s could not be created!
Error writting fileheader for session!
Error closing file for session!
During loading of a synthesizer,\na unknown oscilator tag was found: %s
During loading of a synthesizer,\na unknown transformer tag was found: %s
I/O error saving synthesizer!
Error saving synthesizer (perhaps the file allready exists and is writeprotected)
Fatal error: An unkown view id was found (ID=%s)\nPlease consult MRoc Audiosolutions with this ID.
An internal error occuring in the streaming engine.\nPlease consult MRoc Audiosolutions.
Init Direct Sound failed!
Setting Direct Sound cooperative level failed!
Direct Sound secundary soundbuffer initialisation failed!
Could not get interface Direct Sound IID_IDirectSoundNotify!
Could not set DirectSound notification!
Getting pointer to primary buffer failed!
Setting format of primary buffer failed!
Could not set Direct Sound playposition!
Filling Direct Sound buffer with silence failed after start playing failed!
Could not start Direct Sound playing!
Failed to create update thread!\nPlease consult MRoc Audiosolutions.
Could not set update thread's priority in AudioEngine!\nPlease consult MRoc Audiosolutions.
Could not stop playing Direct Sound buffer!
Error handling DirectSound notifications!
Could not restore Direct Sound buffer!
Could not silent buffer after restoring!
Getting Direct Sound playposition failed!
Lock secundary buffer failed!
Unlock secundary buffer failed!
get buffer status failed!
DMO initialisation failed:\n%s
DMO failed GetParamCount:\n%s
DMO failed GetParamInfo:\n%s
DMO failed GetParam:\n%s

DMO SetutputType failed:\n%s

Channelcount is limited to 4 channels in MSynth LE
Could not set rendering's thread priority.\nPlease consult MRoc Audiosolutions.
UpdateThread failed closing its threads handle.\nPlease consult MRoc Audiosolutions.
Synthesizer could not initialize from XML!\nNo attributes were found.

Error writing file (not good):\n%s

edit instrument
SELECT+ mode, bars can be selected and moved, a bar's note editor can be opened by a doubleclick.
SELECT+ mode, bars can be selected and moved, a bar's note editor can be opened by a doubleclick.
DRAW mode, bars can be created and modified.
GLOW mode, two bars can be glown together.
CUT mode, a bar can be cut into two bars.
bar resolution, notes per bar
Export to wave - in a live session or from left to right marker
Control Automation - records all slider events
Moves the selected transformer one step up
Moves the selected transformer one step down
Deletes the selected transformer
Creates a new transformer
SELECT mode, notes can be selected and moved
DRAW mode, notes can be created and modified
load a sample wave as oscilator (16bit 44.1kHz PCM Wave)
save the sample wave (mono 16bit 44.1kHz PCM Wave)
loops the sample
reverse sample
Selects sample no. %i
save sample no. %i as wave (16bit 44.1kHz PCM Wave)
load sample no. %i from a wave file (16bit 44.1kHz PCM Wave)
